name: Lucky Luke
overview: Hey! COWBOY! How'd you like a crazy chase through the Old West? Yep, Dalton and his brothers are on the run ... and we count on you to catch them. Mississippi, Colorado, your ride will not be easy: Trigger happy Desperados, Indians on the war-path and rampaging herds of bison may send you six feet under. You must shoot faster than your own, be more cunning than a sioux and be as agile as a puma.
